des:
The Constellation Connect Voice skill for Amazon Alexa enables you to control hundreds of paired smart home devices by simply using your voice*.

The Constellation Connect Voice skill allows you to ask Alexa to control your lights, and switches.

Getting the Constellation Connect Voice skill set up is as easy as 1, 2, 3!

1. Once you have searched for and found the Constellation Connect Voice skill in the Alexa app, tap “ENABLE”. You will be prompted to sign in to the Constellation Connect portal to link your Constellation Connect account to Alexa.
2. Next, select the devices you’d like Alexa to control. You can enter custom names for each device (e.g. John’s room lamp, kitchen door, upstairs thermostat, etc.). Please note, you should avoid using any special characters such as underscore (_) when customizing the device names.
3. Finally, tap “Done” and then tap “DISCOVER DEVICES” or ask Alexa to “Discover Devices”. This process can take up to 20 seconds.

Take your smart home to the next level with Constellation Connect Voice and Alexa!


Constellation Connect Voice works with Amazon Alexa enabled devices*. If you have additional questions or require support, please visit https://constellationconnect.com/contact or email support@constellationconnect.com.
